column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=What makes you the most desirable of all candidates running in the riding ?
#Text=I am not a resident of the riding so my decisions will not be based in local bias or favouritism .
#Text=I come with a commitment to help empower families with the authority which is rightfully theirs .
#Text=I seek to serve , not because of a love for power but , because I believe that we need strong families to build a strong society and economy .
#Text=I would cheerfully address the issues of G-P-R and maintain a residence there to ensure there is access to me as their MPP .
#Text=What do you feel are the three most important issues to voters in your riding ?
#Text=Are these the same top three issues that are most important to you ?
#Text=What would you do to address these issues ?
#Text=My first priority is our families .
#Text=It is for them that we work and seek to maintain a stable home life .
#Text=I believe the welfare of their families is of prime importance to the people of G-P-R .
#Text=Whether it 's recreational concerns , information provided to them outside of approved sources such as the internet , education or child care .
#Text=People are concerned primarily about their family .
#Text=This would be the first area I would seek to address .
#Text=I would do so by decreasing government involvement in our personal lives .
#Text=I would like to see parents empowered to make decisions for the well-being of their family .
#Text=This would include the freedom to choose what form of education the children should have .
#Text=Access to health care - There are too many people who do not have access to a family doctor .
#Text=A cooperative clinic does not provide the same access .
#Text=Wait times in hospitals can be as long as 10 hours in the emergency room .
#Text=For all the touting of things getting better , this was about 1 month ago .
#Text=These are important issues .
#Text=Elective surgeries should not be paid for by public health care .
#Text=They are elective and thus un-essential .
#Text=The health care savings would ensure that we are able to fully provide necessary and lifesaving medical care .
#Text=I would work with the federal government to develop a testing and upgrading system to ensure qualified foreign doctors become active medical practitioners within our system .
#Text=Rural areas find the shortage of doctors even more challenging than large cities .

#Text=We would strengthen the Under-serviced Areas Training Program , providing tuition , books and living expenses for each year of medical school in exchange for an equal number of years in under-serviced areas .
#Text=While small communities generally have less dramatic crimes , where there is crime there are victims .
#Text=We need to protect the rights of law abiding citizens over those of convicted offenders .
#Text=Educationally , we need to promote personal responsibility .
#Text=Violent offenders should need not receive reduced sentences .
